test_metadata.test_scope: Non-intrusive security headers and configuration analysis
test_metadata.test_methodology: Passive scanning using standard HTTP requests
ethical_considerations: No data collection beyond security headers
No attempts to bypass security measures
No attempts to access unauthorized areas

test_notes.findings_summary: Several security headers missing, but basic security measures in place
recommendations: Enable HSTS for better SSL/TLS security
Configure Referrer-Policy to control information leakage

ethical_considerations.disclosure: Findings will be reported if permission granted

researcher_declaration.purpose: This security test was conducted for educational and research purposes only.
researcher_declaration.intent: No malicious intent. The goal is to understand web security best practices.
researcher_declaration.scope: Limited to non-intrusive analysis of security headers and configurations.
researcher_declaration.methodology: Used standard HTTP requests to analyze security headers.
researcher_declaration.findings_disclosure: Findings will be reported to site owner if requested.
researcher_declaration.data_handling: No sensitive data was collected or stored.

legal_disclaimer:
This security test was conducted:
            1. For educational and research purposes only
            2. Without any malicious intent
            3. Without attempting to exploit any vulnerabilities
            4. Without collecting any sensitive data
            5. With the intention of reporting findings to the site owner
            
            The researcher acknowledges that:
            - This test was conducted without explicit permission
            - No actual exploitation or data collection occurred
            - The test was limited to passive analysis
            - All findings will be kept confidential unless permission is granted
